name: Missile time
description:
In Missile Time, you need to go through the stage as you watch your health going down. To fill it back up, you need to get hit by turrets missiles, but be quick or you'll die !

Your character speed is also an important part of the game, so keep an eye on it !

Controls : 

  • WASD (configurable in-game to ZQSD or the arrow keys) to move
  • Mouse to click on menu buttons

Game and textures designed and created by charon25.

Game coded in Visual Basic.NET, with no engine.

Music and sound effects credits :
